code: import{ADD_INGREDIENT,REMOVE_INGREDIENT,SET_INGREDIENTS,FETCH_INGREDIENTS_FAILED}from'./actionTypes';import axios from'../../axios-orders';export var addIngredient=function addIngredient(name){return{type:ADD_INGREDIENT,ingredientName:name};};export var removeIngredient=function removeIngredient(name){return{type:REMOVE_INGREDIENT,ingredientName:name};};var setIngredients=function setIngredients(ingredients){return{type:SET_INGREDIENTS,ingredients:ingredients};};var fetchIngredientsFailed=function fetchIngredientsFailed(){return{type:FETCH_INGREDIENTS_FAILED};};export var getIngredients=function getIngredients(){return function(dispatch){axios.get('/ingredients.json').then(function(resp){dispatch(setIngredients(resp.data));}).catch(function(){dispatch(fetchIngredientsFailed());});};};
